info.title: ACOrderAPI V2
info.description: A web API for Ordering with A&C

get.summary: Returns all valid Offer Codes added to specified customer.
get.description: Returns all valid Offer Codes added to specified customer.

post.summary:
Adds new offers for specified code onto customer account and returns 
                     offers added if successful.
post.description:
Adds new offers for specified code onto customer account and returns 
                     offers added if successful.

200.description: Returns a list of new added offers for code.

409.description: Offer code not valid for customer, check response code.

delete.summary: Deletes and offer code from a customer account
delete.description: Deletes and offer code from a customer account

200.description: Returns a list of new added offers for code.

409.description: Offer code is in progress and cannot be deleted.

get.summary: Returns all Orders for specified customer.
get.description: Returns all Orders for specified customer.

delete.summary: Deletes all orders for a customer.
delete.description: Deletes all orders for a customer.

409.description: Orders could not be deleted due to order status.

get.summary: Returns Order for specified customer and delivery date.
get.description: Returns Order for specified customer and delivery date.

404.description: Order matching this CustomerId or Date could not be found.

get.summary: Returns OrderItems for specified customer and delivery date.
get.description: Returns OrderItems for specified customer and delivery date.

404.description: Order matching this CustomerId or Date could not be found.
Item matching this Id could not be found.
Item matching this Id could not be found.

409.description: Product was sold out, unavailable or past cutoff. Reason and available qty is returned.

404.description: Item matching this Id could not be found.

get.summary: Returns Offer for specified customer and delivery date.
get.description: Returns Offer for specified customer and delivery date.

get.summary: Returns Offers for specified customer and delivery date.
get.description: Returns Offers for specified customer and delivery date.

get.summary: Returns credits for specified customer and delivery date.
get.description: Returns credits for specified customer and delivery date.

post.summary: Adds new OrderItem into items for specific delivery date and customer.

400.description: Request not valid or item id not specified

409.description: Product was sold out, unavailable or past cutoff. Reason and available qty is returned.

put.summary: Updates quantity on order for product and optional frequency.

200.description: Returns the updated item when successful.

409.description: Unable to accept update.  Error Message will indicate the issue.  When limited availability, the remaining availability is returned.

get.summary: Returns all Previous Orders for specified customer.
get.description: Returns all Previous Orders for specified customer.

ResultName.description: ResultName representing description of result of code input.

OfferMessage.description: Message relating to the full status of the Offer.

NeedMore.description: The amount more needed to qualify

ValidFrom.description: Date the Offer is Valid From

ValidTo.description: Date the Offer is Valid To.

DeliveriesQualifying.description: Number of deliveries that have qualified

IsCodeInProgress.description:
Is the offer related to a code that has been applied to an order past cut 
            off?

DeliveriesToQualify.description: Number of deliveries needed to qualify for the Offer.

Categories.description: List of the order offer categories

ValidFrom.description: Date the Offer is Valid From

ValidTo.description: Date the Offer is Valid To.

IsInProgress.description: Has the offer already been applied to orders?

DeliveryDate.description: Delivery Date of the customer Order.

Items.description: Queryable collection of OrderItem due for delivery on DeliveryDate.

Offers.description: List of offers on this order.

Credits.description: List of credits on this order.

CanOrder.description: True if customer can still place orders for date.

NumItems.description: The number of items in the order.

OrderValue.description: The total value of the order.

OrderValueBeforeDiscounts.description: The total value of the order before discounts.

MinimumOrderValue.description: The minimum order value for this customer.

OfferDiscounts.description: The amount of discount from the offers.

OtherCredits.description: The amount off from other credits.

TotalSavings.description: The total amount of discount from offers, credits and discounts.

OrderTotal.description: The total amount paid by the customer.

TotalBeforeDiscounts.description: The total order value and del charge for discounts.

Confirmed.description: WHether order is confirmed (full order) or not (basket).

DeliveryDate.description: Delivery Date of the customer Order.

Confirmed.description: True confirmed order, false if basket item.

Id.description: Unique Id for order item (aka TransactionId). Null only on Insert.

ProductId.description: Id for the Product on Order for this OrderItem.

Quantity.description: The Quantity of the product on order for this Order Item.

Frequency.description: The Frequency in terms of number of weeks recurring for this item.

Price.description: The Price of the product on ordedr for this item.

TypeName.description: The Type name of the type for the item.

ErrorCodeName.description: The ErroCode name if there is unavailability for this item.

RelatedProductId.description: The RelatedProductId if there is a substitution for this item.

RelatedQuantity.description: The RelatedQuantity if there is a substiution for this item.

Items.description: A collection of Items for the Order Offer Category.

OrderItemId.description: Id of the related order item.

Confirmed.description: Whether the order item and order is confirmed or unconfirmed (basket item).

OrderStatus.description:
1: Open_Empty - Future Order with no items.
2: Open_UnderMinimum - Future Order but under minimum required spend.
3: Open_Scheduled - Future Order and will be delivered (Assumes customer is valid in all other ways).
4: Packing - Order being packed.
5: Delivering - Order out for Delivery.
6: Delivered - Order has been Delivered (not flagged until roll out of driver app).
7: Past - Order occurs in the past.
8: Archived - Order detail has expired and been moved to slower moving storage.
9: AccountLocked - Account issue prevents order amendments.
10: Open_OnHoliday - Customer has holiday date set for future date.
11: Closed_OnHoliday - Customer has holiday for the current delivery which is past cutoff.

FirstDelivery.description: Delivery Date of the First Order.

LastDelivery.description: Delivery Date of the First Order.

ActualQuantity.description: Actual Quantity for given delivey Date

TotalQuantity.description: Total Quantity for given delivery Date

ErrorName.description: Unique Id for order item (aka TransactionId). Null only on Insert.

Id.description: Unique Id for a new order item (aka TransactionId/BasketItemId).

QuantityAvailable.description: The Quantity of the product available for the Order Item.
